meanings.definition: The quality or state of being practical.
meanings.sent1: Her practicalnesses in solving everyday problems impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The practicalnesses of the new tool made it a valuable addition to the workshop.
meanings.sent3: Despite his love for creativity, his practicalnesses in budgeting were unmatched.
meanings.sent4: Her practicalnesses shone like a beacon in the chaotic office environment.
meanings.sent5: The practicalnesses of his advice were evident in the successful project outcome.

meanings.definition: The practical aspects or qualities of something.
meanings.sent1: The practicalnesses of the plan made it easy to implement.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the practicalnesses of technology is essential in today's world.
meanings.sent3: The practicalnesses of the situation became clear once they started working on it.
meanings.sent4: His practicalnesses were like a well-oiled machine, always ready for any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The practicalnesses of the design ensured it was both functional and stylish.
